about.title: About
about.caption: Pragmatic frontend, product focus, and tools that help teams ship.
summary: I’m a frontend engineer with 6 years of experience on enterprise React platforms. I organize reusable components, standardize patterns, and keep UIs consistent across the product lifecycle.
In recent projects I’ve worked on banking back offices and apps that integrate AI APIs, looking after DX, QA, and release pipelines for distributed squads.
